definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: But the request for “sayings” was not an unreasonable one.
sentences.chinese: 然而“驚世之語”並非不合理的請求。

sentences.english: they don't pay fair wages, their hours are inhumane,
sentences.chinese: 工資不合理，工作時間太沒人性了。

sentences.english: Note that there are some combinations which may not be reasonable or desirable.
sentences.chinese: 注意，某些組合可能是不合理的，或是應該避免的。

sentences.english: Does anyone think this seems not reasonable?
With such a great victory come unreasonably great expectations.
sentences.chinese: 如此的重大的勝利帶來了不合理的巨大期望。

sentences.english: In another word, the range of relating right shall not be unreasonably extended.
sentences.chinese: 換句話說，鄰接權的範圍不得被不合理的擴大。

sentences.english: About 80 percent of the decisions you make are inconsequential.
sentences.chinese: 你所做的決定中約有80%是不合理的。

sentences.english: This is a case of inappropriate sharing.
sentences.chinese: 這是不合理共享的一種情況。

sentences.english: Result The findings showed positive correlation between irrational use of antibiotics and nosocomial infections.
sentences.chinese: 結果醫院感染髮生率與抗生素不合理應用呈正相關。

sentences.english: Objective To maker clear the Irrational Prescriptions in Outpatient and Emergency Departments in our Hospital promote reasonable use the medicine.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解我院門急診不合理用藥情況，促進合理用藥。

sentences.english: The crowd clamoured against the unfair decision .
sentences.chinese: 周圍的人羣紛紛反對這項不合理的決定。

sentences.english: Sixth: No reasonable price system in the natural monopoly industry.
sentences.chinese: 第六，自然壟斷行業的價格體系不合理。

sentences.english: This involves the reform of irrational parts of the present scientific and technological system.
sentences.chinese: 這包括改革現有的科技體制中不合理的部分。

sentences.english: But of course,the no branching rule didn't seem very intuitive.
sentences.chinese: 但當然，無分支規則顯得並不合理。

sentences.english: Van Til does not deny the legitimacy of extrapolations and negations as such.
sentences.chinese: 範泰爾並沒有說，延伸和否定是不合理的作法。
